Title: Provides that assessed values of cooperative units and condominiums shall not increase by more than 3% in the two years following resolution of tax certiorari proceedings
Summary: Provides that assessed values of cooperative units and condominiums shall not increase by more than 3% in the two years following resolution of tax certiorari proceedings.
LawCode: Add ยง11-240.2, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to rates of increase of assessed values of cooperative units and condominiums
